attributes.action: Eliminate the use of single-use plastic in takeaway restaurants.
attributes.additional_details: We are increasingly worried about the future of our planet, with plastic contributing to a huge carbon footprint. We want to eliminate the use of unnecessary plastic in takeaways nationally.
attributes.background: We are highly concerned with the use of single-use plastics. This is because it uses fossil fuels, is non- biodegradable and pollutes our oceans resulting in the killing of animals and disruption of food chains.
